name: Blacky Hole
description:
The black hole is approaching quick so watch out and don't get pulled past the event horizon! In this mid to fast paced action-arcade game you play as a planet trying to out run the pull of the approaching black hole while dodging the cosmic debris being devoured by the attacking Black Hole.

Play in either of 2 play modes for endless fun! Story mode will allow you to gain player levels which unlock different planets to play as. It also offers special power-ups during play to become invincible for a short period of time and destroy the objects blocking your escape route. Play to unlock all 17 Story Mode levels.  If you get stuck on a difficult level, don't worry, you wont miss out on planet unlocks as you can replay previous levels and gain valuable XP!

 Infinite mode is styled after the classic side-scroller obstacle dodging games and is a great challenge for getting high-scores. Check out the "How To Play" section in the Main Menu for details on all the obstacles to avoid and collectables to gather. This is the first game developed by Alaska Topshelf Entertainment and we are excided to get rolling into game making. Blacky Hole is available in the Google Play Store for Android and on itch.io for PC!
